title: # 434 - Steve Byrne & ME
description:
Today I sit down with comedian Steve Byrne. We talk about his new movie, biggest bar tabs, blackout stories, his first time directing, and much more!

Check out Steve’s new movie “The Opening Act” available Oct 16th in theaters or on demand at iTunes & Amazon.

This episode is also brought to you by Quip. Go to http://www.getquip.com/bertcast to get your first refill FREE.

This episode is brought to you by Whoop. Go to http://www.Whoop.com and use the Code “Bert” at checkout to save 15%. 

This episode is also brought to you by Theragun. Go to http://www.Theragun.com/Bertcast and get your Gen 4 Theragun today.

This episode is also brought to you by Manscaped. Get 20% Off and Free Shipping with the code BERT at http://www.Manscaped.com.  

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer
